actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate on steps the Government of Iran must take before President Obama meets with the President of Iran.
subjects: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that President Obama should not engage in any meeting with President Rouhani before Iran: (1) affirms the right of Israel to exist as a Jewish state, and (2) releases all U.S. citizens unjustly detained as prisoners of conscience in Iran.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate on steps the Government of Iran must take before President Obama meets with the President of Iran.
